description:
North Korea is something of a locked box to the rest of the world, and even one of the handiest apparatuses through the internet—is largely inaccessible to anyone outside the country. Thanks to what appears to be an accidental reveal, however, we can now peek inside North Korea’s internet tubes.对于外部世界来说，朝鲜就像是一个上了锁的盒子，即使是通过像互联网这样最方便的途径，也没有人能一窥朝鲜内网的“风采”。不过，多亏一次偶然的泄漏，让我们得以窥见朝鲜的网络系统。

A Reddit thread posted earlier this morning linked to a GitHub data dumpthat apparently includes a list of websites registered to North Korea’s official domain, .kp. Previously, little was known about the country’s web habits, including its registered domains, but yesterday, the list of registered sites—just 28 in all—became openly accessible.美国社交新闻论坛网站Reddit23日早上发布了一个链接到一个叫GitHub网站的数据存储库，这个数据库包括一系列带有朝鲜官方域名“.kp.”的网站。之前，很少有人知道这个国家的网络习惯，包括他的注册域名，但是现在，这个一共包括28个注册网站的清单变成公开的了。

Many of the pages—which include a travel website, a cooking website, and something called friend.com—are now down, but screenshots quickly popped up on Reddit.由于浏览量过大许多网站都已经瘫痪了，这些网站涉及旅游，烹饪，甚至还有一个名为friend.com的网站，不过好奇的网友在Reddit已经截了图。

This one looks like it might be some kind of social network这个看上去像是社交网站

A site for the elderly老年人的网站

Here’s a travel website这是旅游网站

And what looks to be a tour-booking website这是旅游预订网站

A university homepage某大学首页

A sportball page体育网站

A website about Korean food有关朝鲜食物的网站

A spiritual guidelines-type deal精神指导方针类网站

A news website新闻网站

Reddit has a few more screenshots, but they generally all look sort of the same—a little odd and very clearly created by a governing body. In truth, they’re not any weirder than the rest of the world’s websites, though they do have a distinctly bare-bones, antiseptic feel.Reddit有一些截图，但是他们看上去都差不多，有一点奇怪，很明显一看就知道是政府部门建的。但是事实上，跟世界上其它网站相比，朝鲜网站也没有特别奇葩的画风，尽管它们看上去真的很“乏味”。

声明：本双语文章的中文翻译系沪江英语原创内容，转载请注明出处。中文翻译仅代表译者个人观点，仅供参考。如有不妥之处，欢迎指正。

title: 美媒：听说朝鲜人民只能上这28个网站？笑CRY
